channel.title: Saradomin ~ Finally something unique! Get paid to play!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.saradomin.com/community/public/style_images/5_Untitled.png[/img] | [url=http://saradomin.com]Home[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/community]Join the community Forums[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/play]Play on the webclient[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar]Download the Launcher[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/vote.php]Vote[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/highscores]HighScores[/url] |
Check out our latest update! Void Knight Overlord! He will be dropping all rare items from claws, to torva, to parthats. All drop rates will be extremely low. He has 7 attacks that he will perform one of which every 10 seconds. - Drops his targets prayer by 15 points. - Increases his defense by 15% (10 seconds) - Burn his target for 15 points damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds) - Freeze his target and inflict 5 points of damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds) - Lower his targets defence, attack and strength by 15 levels - He does double damage (10 seconds) - He becomes immune to damage, and inflicts all targets around him for 25 damage (5 seconds immunity, then 15 seconds of nothing)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eSkIjU0.png[/img]
[url=http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/426-update-log-3315-void-knight-overlord/]http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/426-update-log-3315-void-knight-overlord/[/url]
Also check out our Weekly Update Communications
[url=http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/383-weekly-update-2212015/]http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/383-weekly-update-2212015/[/url]
Want to talk to the staff team or other players? Join our TeamSpeak! [url=http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/329-saradomin-teamspeak-launch/]http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/329-saradomin-teamspeak-launch/[/url]
Also, look forward to the coming of the Saradomin Official Radio!
[size=5]Journey to the world of Saradomin, a 317 RSPS that's packed with high quality content, focused around the rise of Saradomin. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE that helps foster our player-driven economy.
At Saradomin, we strive to deliver unique, distinct, & diverse content that's exclusive to our server. We're constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with content of the highest quality.
If you have been looking for these things, you've found the tip of the spear in RSPS excellence!
We offer competitive xp rates, daily bug fixes, weekly content updates, weekend events and more!
We are building our lore, quests and cutscenes as we speak getting ready for the first quest of a 40 quest storyline! - All prewritten by our wonderful lore writer! [/size]
[spoiler=Staff Team]Chris Ruzylo - Manager - Owner Mobster - Developer Connor - Community Manager - Developer Maria - Lore Writer Thor - Developer Stuart - Developer Poesy700 - Developer Kieran - Developer Saad - Web Developer Misty - Developer[/spoiler]
Update log will be edited on the main thread weekly, rather then every single day. However, I will post any updates as they are made. Each update listed is simply the commit message from our repository, to avoid going through 20+ pages and saying each and every change, for each commit on each page. Some commit comments are very unexplainitory, fixes to other commits, addition to previous commits, may contain more then the comment says, or may be simple a few lines changed. [spoiler=Updates] 2/23/15 - / 3/2/15 - abuse_reports sql error fx - Login -> Banned messages - InstantationError -> UOE - Cluescroll items shop - removed "Fight Pits points" and replaced with "Vote Points," - added timed action system for double xp lamps - Add saving for player.getDoubleExperience - player.getDoubleExperienceAction - Added server and client buildVersions so new client patchs will require the newer client - Upon logging in, if a player has double XP time leftover from a 2 hour lamp, it will tell them how much time they have left. - Added the click item option to the 2 hour lamp item id 11137 and it also applies 120 minutes of double XP. - Run energy fix - Added untradeable items array and a loop check for it in trading. - Fixed a bug causing login issues - Added double exp column to local db - subscription points - Implementation of new run system which fixed all previous 100 and 300 energy amount run bugs. - Fight pits lobby fixed - Fight pits starting fix - Fight pits ended fixed - Fixed Void Knight Overlord not being multi - Added void knight overlord drops - Frame for registering a new account (still has to be implemented to show up) - Implementation of the registration frame. - DS_Store files changes 2/6/15 - 2/21/15 - Fixed Subscriber Icons - Updated Saving and Loading - Integration Server Edited - Shop Fixes - Numerous xp changes - Subscriber XP algorithm fixes - Bugs command - CommandManager changes - PlayerCommand changes - Change password fixed - Friendschat bug fixed - Doublename fix - Local Running fixes - Yell fixed - SQLite Fixes - Switched from SQLite to MySQL - Fixed up prospecting - Added more ores to mine - Removed player updating bug which made players invisible - Fixed forceMove animation from not working properly - Implemented cached update blocks - Fixed walkable interfaces - Fixed cannon being attempted to pickup twice - Walkable interfaces will now update after walking instead of before - Fixed npcs that should terminate sooner - Fixed summons attacking players outside of the owners combat level - Fixed summons attacking players not in wilderness - Added a mob effect system - Fixed freezing npcs with ice spells - Fixed trading inside the duel arena - Rewrote bank depositing to support BoB - Fixed Saradomin Godswrod special attack - Fixed clue scrolls not working properly - Fixed special not restoring properly - Subscriber xp 30% fix - Update time in connection logs - New users insert fix - Save combat level upon creation - Run.sh added - Update player subscriptions - Fixed 3x run for subscribers - Player save edits - Netty 4.1 implemented - Added option pane that will print any errors for the user of the client if one arrises - Updated ant file - Added Check Santions on login - Added error loggins - Fixed an issue causing server lag - Made player list for mod + but count will still show for players - Fixed netty packet processing - Initial cutscene stuff - Some refactoring - Player mob and updating fixes - Stopped saving forums_id on each save - Fixed subscriber zone stall - Skills not saving fix - Require users to register on forums fix - Applied ConnectionSet edits to client.java - Sanctions endpoints - Subscriber shop prices changed - Runescape html3 chars - Send errors via IS - Subscriber points added - Subscriber points connected - Fixed having to logout for subscriber - Skills loading fix - Add pinging - Added EZMySQL - Renew connection also checks for null/isClosed - Format Launcher - Stack overflow fix - Fix to player updating; Other changes to the buffer making sure resources are properly released and will not overflow the stack - Removed the variable write caret - Fixed weapon and shield disappearing after animation - Added void knight overload - Added closing statements - Add a line break in errors - Always return new connections - Fixed cannon duplication bug - Fixed 2x slayer points - Added buy x - Fixed steel square shield on smithing interface. - Fixed up prospecting. - Added some more ores to mining. - Removed the player updating bug which made players invisible. - Fixed forceMove animations from not working properly. - Implemented cached update blocks. - Fixed walkable interfaces. - Fixed so cannon isn't attempted to pick up twice. - Walkable interfaces will now update after walking instead of before. - Fixed npcs that should terminate sooner.- Fixed clue scrolls not working properly. - Fixed special not restoring properly. - Donator should now receive 30% bonus experience. - Fixed summons attacking players outside of the owners combat level. - Fixed summons attacking players outside of the wilderness. - Added a mob effect system. - Fixed freezing npcs with ice spells. - Fixed trading inside of the duel arena. - Rewrote bank depositing to support BoB. - Fixed saradomin godsword special attack. - Updated sqlite library - Added local username and pass for local testing - Subscriber Fixes - Change Password Fix - Friends chat issue fix - Added the bugs command - Fixed subscriber addons. - Updated player saving and loading.
2/5/15 - 1/12/15 - Redid saving and moved from SQLite to MySQL - Fixed steel square shield on smithing interface. - Fixed up prospecting. - Added some more ores to mining. - Removed the player updating bug which made players invisible. - Fixed forceMove animations from not working properly. - Implemented cached update blocks. - Fixed walkable interfaces. - Fixed so cannon isn't attempted to pick up twice. - Walkable interfaces will now update after walking instead of before. - Fixed npcs that should terminate sooner.- Fixed clue scrolls not working properly. - Fixed special not restoring properly. - Donator should now receive 30% bonus experience. - Fixed summons attacking players outside of the owners combat level. - Fixed summons attacking players outside of the wilderness. - Added a mob effect system. - Fixed freezing npcs with ice spells. - Fixed trading inside of the duel arena. - Rewrote bank depositing to support BoB. - Fixed saradomin godsword special attack. - Updated sqlite library - Added local username and pass for local testing - Subscriber Fixes - Change Password Fix - Friends chat issue fix - Added the bugs command - Fixed subscriber addons - Updated player saving and loading - Fixed cursor being invisible issue - Fixed new hover client crash issue - Fixed shop crash issue - Redid the servers sql saving and loading - Started working on admin panel - Fixed a launcher issue that would corrupt the jar - Fixed misc other minor issues.
1/19/15 - 2/4/15 -Allows player to fight in wildy - IntegrationServer.java edited online with Bitbucket - Sanctions TS fix - Conversion - IS fixes - IntegrationServer.java edited online with Bitbucket - Starter fix and players command lists players on interface. - Added saving for addons - local build false, may want to change this, - Change - Subscribers can yell. - Added getter for SubscriberAddons class instantiation "addons," method to apply correct drop rates, and method to apply correct XP rates. - Applied xp modifier to skills - Addition to commenting. - Applied subscriber drop rates to drops. - Added drop rate checking fields and also commented most of the class for basic understanding. - Removed Dice Bag from shop and removed the dicing zone. - XP changes. Announcement changes. - SusbcriberAddons - Added P'ring stats for test purposes (can be removed after beta), Added items into the correct wielding slots and made so that admins can be attacked (also for testing purposes). - SubscriberPlugin Class added - Capitalize username - Clients can now set XP and Level targets without the client crashing - Fixes teleport and ladder appearance glitches so that the player equipment is not shown. I'm assuming that the appearance update on the client does not take into account the weapon and shield slot. Object teleports such as levers will still have the problem. - Added my name to the Admin list for live server debugs and testing. - Lowercase commands - Refactored Client.java to Saradomin.java b/c OS X shows name of main client on the top bar. - Shop System - Still figuring out why it doesn't open with the command (shopsystem). - Changed the name of slice of cake from 2/3 of a cake to slice of cake. - Added the cake slices, when eating a cake you will only eat one slice at a time. - shop system - added ::bugs - Misc Launcher Updates - Skill Goal Fix - xp fix - Constitution XP - Client Changes. - ofcourse - PlayerLoader.java edited online with Bitbucket - adjustments to the npc spawns - wierd shit - Ant fix - Adding support for third argument initializing the variable LOAD_PLAYERS_FROM_DB. - Lower username and password fix - Endpoint/db integration for deleted players - Subscriber Updates - Save and load HS from db - Run Server locally w/o using db (Change the bool LOADFROMDB o false in constants - Entire Server Code Reformatting - Added maria to super amdin list - Added default method to reset camera shaking. - Cutscene packets added - Fixed teleport name in client. - Final fixes to new home. 100% done now. - Finishing touches on the new home. - IntegrationServer.java edited online with Bitbucket - SuperAdminCommands.java edited online with Bitbucket - Ladders working - No message - fix - Contiuned home change of objects, npcs, and home buttion teleport. - start on the new home, moved a few objects and npcs will finish in the morning. - Super admin thor !!! FHEEWSWWSS PHEWWW - Misc updates - IntegrationServer.java edited online with Bitbucket - IntegrationServer.java edited online with Bitbucket - Git Updates - Refactoring intgerationserver - Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/master' into sql - BackUp System. - Removed Extreme Donator rank and all calls of it. Setup basic Subscriber/Subscription settings. Added Owner Name string in constants, added owner name and server name strings in client configurations. Will add everything else to finish subscriber when saad connects everything to website. - Sql saving and loading if needed. Not the best way but oh well - Removed an unused path. Removed renamed classes. - Adding jsons - Merged sql_saving into master - Merge needed - final - Message: yay - lower Case username fix - Minor server changes - Final ant changes - Commit test - project.properties edited online with Bitbucket - project.properties created online with Bitbucket - nblibraries.properties created online with Bitbucket - Finally - project.xml edited online with Bitbucket - build-impl.xml edited online with Bitbucket - rollback - Ant - Ant Builder - More changes - Ip changes - git ignore pushed - Updates..... - Saves Account From Online - Added Plugins - superadmin - Saradomin Guide hardcode fix - fix - push - Cache - ip. Server. - Renamed guide - Misc Chages. - Fixed loading bar. - cache updates - Client fixes. - Initial commit.
12-5 - 12/20 - Chat.java edited online with Bitbucket - Packet Logging Fixes - Fixed AM or PM on the date constructor so should properly work. - Fix session log user id - Server Info - IS fixes - IS getServerInfo() - Playernames - Fixed up logging - Logging fixes - Server and Client upload - Renaming. - JSON files pushed - Renaming 2
12/3 - 12/4 - Updated bitbucket Readme - get Session Logs - Fixes for Logging - Method change (wrong method) - Log packets - SessionsHandler Integrated - Updating remotely - Added SessionsHandler - Commands to test cutscenes - mypos, tele - Preliminary tests for cutscenes - Start at 100 hp (1hp bug fix) - Integration Server, resolved status for report abuse - Run script - Integration Server added Server Restart - Subscriber shop - Saving Fix - Cache pushed/Fixed - Diff Debug line - Debug line - More sexy code in IS - IS Fixes - Typos in much sexy logic (reporting) (skills saving) - Much Sexy Logic (reporting) (skills saving) - IS Fix - Fixed the server uptime to fit onto the information tab - Added some new methods - Redid error messages on login screen - Added player count and server uptime to the information tab. - Renamed method207 to addObject - Fixed NPC and Player chat models - More IS Fixes - IS Fixes - Player.databaseId isn't used for anything, it's just there - Player.id = forum_id - Report abuse interface fixed
12/1 - Lore and quests started in the making
Removed work from july-november due to max character limit: "The following error or errors occurred while posting this message: The message exceeds the maximum allowed length (20000 characters)." [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Website Updates] Fixed landing page cookies Highscores ranking fix Vote setup Image for background fixed Landing made Account not creating an account ingame fix Reset password fix Change password fix Saving changes to server from website Subscription successfully integrated Website redone Admin Panel for ingame accounts. Highscores fixed and setup Vote fixed and setup Subscription/ip.nexus setup Website/server integration Home page fixes Report Abuse ingame administrative page added Rank handling ingame based on forums rank Forums account creation creates ingame account Other misc fixes. More to come. [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4xnJnheb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eoGbDlAb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NvLNbTGb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ciNnqjQb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qQRizJEb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3mN9xO6b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CgcLlaTb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r1bZFX2b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KwB1Ol1b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9osX4rzb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZaonMyqb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mvY9rFOb.png?2[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6xvHWFYb.png?2[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IiQ1Yc9b.png?2[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wOdXVK3b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TN3WSaZb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dTzUivQb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6LfMw1Hb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f1Kcwkdb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RV0aYxzb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MaYr7Qob.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZiZXH9eb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/juEiyQtb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RkWpHygb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y5ncLK3b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rkV1E4nb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u6p3tcwb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/InoUNdzb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iJmzFucb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TAFyWY4b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sXoUYh3b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AJk9jF2b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F8kufxYb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MmkP3JCb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tn11gdCb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7HdSzn9b.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/97pBrykb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T4tiHIYb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S6rm6Bjb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BxYrZTrb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HRJnzDob.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/scVxBnlb.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2HHWjYVb.png?1[/img] And much much much more!
[/spoiler] [/center]

Updates: Multiple fixes including a major fix that was causing the server to overload and resulting in a crash.
Hit a new highest of 52 yesterday.

item.title: Saradomin ~ Finally something unique! Get paid to play!
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

Newest update log - Sorry for a lack of updates

(Still in testing, and doesnt have drops yet.)
Void Knight Overlord
You can get to him from the Void Knight at home.

Check out our latest update! Void Knight Overlord! He will be dropping all rare items from claws, to torva, to parthats. All drop rates will be extremely low.
He has 7 attacks that he will perform one of which every 10 seconds.

  • Drops his targets prayer by 15 points.
  • Increases his defense by 15% (10 seconds)
  • Burn his target for 15 points damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds)
  • Freeze his target and inflict 5 points of damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds)
  • Lower his targets defence, attack and strength by 15 levels
  • He does double damage (10 seconds)
  • He becomes immune to damage, and inflicts all targets around him for 25 damage (5 seconds immunity, then 15 seconds of nothing)

Other Misc Updates
2/23/15 - / 3/2/15

  • abuse_reports sql error fx
  • Login -> Banned messages
  • InstantationError -> UOE
  • Cluescroll items shop
  • removed “Fight Pits points” and replaced with “Vote Points,”
  • added timed action system for double xp lamps
  • Add saving for player.getDoubleExperience
  • player.getDoubleExperienceAction
  • Added server and client buildVersions so new client patchs will require the newer client
  • Upon logging in, if a player has double XP time leftover from a 2 hour lamp, it will tell them how much time they have left.
  • Added the click item option to the 2 hour lamp item id 11137 and it also applies 120 minutes of double XP.
  • Run energy fix
  • Added untradeable items array and a loop check for it in trading.
  • Fixed a bug causing login issues
  • Added double exp column to local db
  • subscription points
  • Implementation of new run system which fixed all previous 100 and 300 energy amount run bugs.
  • Fight pits lobby fixed
  • Fight pits starting fix
  • Fight pits ended fixed
  • Fixed Void Knight Overlord not being multi
  • Added void knight overlord drops
  • Frame for registering a new account (still has to be implemented to show up)
  • Implementation of the registration frame.
  • DS_Store files changes

item.source: Saradomin ~ Finally something unique! Get paid to play!

item.title: Saradomin ~ Finally something unique! Get paid to play!
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

Bump. Fixed any and all links on the website that were redirecting wrong. Started adding in the plugins for Subscriber Perks. Fixed the issue where account wasnt created ingame on forums registration. Was due to a referral package we added. Fixed an issue with the mouse disappearing in the client (Will be updated in the next client we put up, with multiple changes). Converted our shop system to work with the current json rather then txt to save time, the new shop interface and system will be released in the next client update. Added last clan chat joined sub text, when typing in a clan chat to join. Auto join last clan chat on login added. Added a discount subscription package for 20% off one month available at registration only.

Read full topic

item.title: Saradomin ~ Finally something unique! Get paid to play!
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[center]
| Home | Join the community Forums | Play on the webclient | Download the Launcher | Vote | HighScores |

Check out our latest update! Void Knight Overlord! He will be dropping all rare items from claws, to torva, to parthats. All drop rates will be extremely low.
He has 7 attacks that he will perform one of which every 10 seconds.

  • Drops his targets prayer by 15 points.
  • Increases his defense by 15% (10 seconds)
  • Burn his target for 15 points damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds)
  • Freeze his target and inflict 5 points of damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds)
  • Lower his targets defence, attack and strength by 15 levels
  • He does double damage (10 seconds)
  • He becomes immune to damage, and inflicts all targets around him for 25 damage (5 seconds immunity, then 15 seconds of nothing)

http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/426-update-log-3315-void-knight-overlord/

Also check out our Weekly Update Communications

http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/383-weekly-update-2212015/

Want to talk to the staff team or other players? Join our TeamSpeak!
http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/topic/329-saradomin-teamspeak-launch/

Also, look forward to the coming of the Saradomin Official Radio!

[size=5]Journey to the world of Saradomin, a 317 RSPS that’s packed with high quality content, focused around the rise of Saradomin. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE that helps foster our player-driven economy.

At Saradomin, we strive to deliver unique, distinct, & diverse content that’s exclusive to our server. We’re constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with content of the highest quality.

If you have been looking for these things, you’ve found the tip of the spear in RSPS excellence!

We offer competitive xp rates, daily bug fixes, weekly content updates, weekend events and more!

We are building our lore, quests and cutscenes as we speak getting ready for the first quest of a 40 quest storyline! - All prewritten by our wonderful lore writer!
[/size]

[spoiler=Staff Team]Chris Ruzylo - Manager - Owner
Mobster - Developer
Connor - Community Manager - Developer
Maria - Lore Writer
Thor - Developer
Stuart - Developer
Poesy700 - Developer
Kieran - Developer
Saad - Web Developer
Misty - Developer[/spoiler]

Update log will be edited on the main thread weekly, rather then every single day. However, I will post any updates as they are made.
Each update listed is simply the commit message from our repository, to avoid going through 20+ pages and saying each and every change, for each commit on each page. Some commit comments are very unexplainitory, fixes to other commits, addition to previous commits, may contain more then the comment says, or may be simple a few lines changed.
[spoiler=Updates]
2/23/15 - / 3/2/15

  • abuse_reports sql error fx
  • Login -> Banned messages
  • InstantationError -> UOE
  • Cluescroll items shop
  • removed “Fight Pits points” and replaced with “Vote Points,”
  • added timed action system for double xp lamps
  • Add saving for player.getDoubleExperience
  • player.getDoubleExperienceAction
  • Added server and client buildVersions so new client patchs will require the newer client
  • Upon logging in, if a player has double XP time leftover from a 2 hour lamp, it will tell them how much time they have left.
  • Added the click item option to the 2 hour lamp item id 11137 and it also applies 120 minutes of double XP.
  • Run energy fix
  • Added untradeable items array and a loop check for it in trading.
  • Fixed a bug causing login issues
  • Added double exp column to local db
  • subscription points
  • Implementation of new run system which fixed all previous 100 and 300 energy amount run bugs.
  • Fight pits lobby fixed
  • Fight pits starting fix
  • Fight pits ended fixed
  • Fixed Void Knight Overlord not being multi
  • Added void knight overlord drops
  • Frame for registering a new account (still has to be implemented to show up)
  • Implementation of the registration frame.
  • DS_Store files changes
    2/6/15 - 2/21/15
  • Fixed Subscriber Icons
  • Updated Saving and Loading
  • Integration Server Edited
  • Shop Fixes
  • Numerous xp changes
  • Subscriber XP algorithm fixes
  • Bugs command
  • CommandManager changes
  • PlayerCommand changes
  • Change password fixed
  • Friendschat bug fixed
  • Doublename fix
  • Local Running fixes
  • Yell fixed
  • SQLite Fixes
  • Switched from SQLite to MySQL
  • Fixed up prospecting
  • Added more ores to mine
  • Removed player updating bug which made players invisible
  • Fixed forceMove animation from not working properly
  • Implemented cached update blocks
  • Fixed walkable interfaces
  • Fixed cannon being attempted to pickup twice
  • Walkable interfaces will now update after walking instead of before
  • Fixed npcs that should terminate sooner
  • Fixed summons attacking players outside of the owners combat level
  • Fixed summons attacking players not in wilderness
  • Added a mob effect system
  • Fixed freezing npcs with ice spells
  • Fixed trading inside the duel arena
  • Rewrote bank depositing to support BoB
  • Fixed Saradomin Godswrod special attack
  • Fixed clue scrolls not working properly
  • Fixed special not restoring properly
  • Subscriber xp 30% fix
  • Update time in connection logs
  • New users insert fix
  • Save combat level upon creation
  • Run.sh added
  • Update player subscriptions
  • Fixed 3x run for subscribers

  • Updated ant file
  • Added Check Santions on login
  • Added error loggins
  • Fixed an issue causing server lag
  • Made player list for mod + but count will still show for players

  • Removed the player updating bug which made players invisible.
  • Fixed forceMove animations from not working properly.
  • Implemented cached update blocks.
  • Fixed walkable interfaces.
  • Fixed so cannon isn’t attempted to pick up twice.
  • Walkable interfaces will now update after walking instead of before.
  • Fixed npcs that should terminate sooner.- Fixed clue scrolls not working properly.
  • Fixed special not restoring properly.

1/19/15 - 2/4/15
-Allows player to fight in wildy

  • IntegrationServer.java edited online with Bitbucket

  • Applied xp modifier to skills

The message exceeds the maximum allowed length (20000 characters).”

Other misc fixes. More to come.

And much much much more!
